channel.title: Smart Home Circle

item.title: How To Change Graph Colors in Energy Dashboard In Home Assistant
item.description: In this article, we will look at how you can change colors for your energy graph in the energy dashboard of Home Assistant.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)
